snippet: The Chinese government said trade figures for April showed some improvement, but weren’t strong enough to pull the nation out of its economic quagmire.
abstract: Chinese government release trade figures slightly better than economists expected, but still indicate demand is fairly weak in foreign markets and in China itself.
lead_paragraph: The Chinese government said trade figures for April showed some improvement, but weren’t strong enough to pull the nation out of its economic quagmire.

headline.main: China Trade Figures Rise, but Weaknesses Persist
headline.print_headline: China Trade Figures Rise Slightly, but Weaknesses Persist
